welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zhongtanying, a city filled with rich culture and breathtaking landscapes. Get ready to experience the charm and charm of our city, known for its delicious cuisine and historical sites. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Zhongtanying has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but registration is required.
